headline: S&P Global (SPGI): Assessing Valuation as Investors Weigh Leadership Changes and Q3 2025 Earnings Outlook
summary: S&P Global is drawing attention after announcing leadership changes. Catherine Clay is set to lead S&P Dow Jones Indices, and Chief Digital Solutions Officer Swamy Kocherlakota is planning his exit later this year. Investors are also looking ahead to upcoming third quarter results. See our latest analysis for S&P Global. S&P Global’s recent C-suite moves arrive as the stock trades at $479.81. While the company’s long-term total shareholder returns remain robust, most notably a 61.6% gain over...
